title: Endotracheal Tube (ETT) Depth and Tidal Volume Calculator
desc: The Endotracheal Tube (ETT) Depth and Tidal Volume Calculator estimates depth of optimal ETT placement and target tidal volume  by height.

data.evidence:
Chula formula: ETT depth = 0.1 * [height (cm)] + 4

Additional formulas:

  • Ideal body weight (IBW), men = 50 kg + 2.3 * [height (in) – 60]
  • IBW, women = 45.5 kg + 2.3 * [height (in) – 60]
  • Usual tidal volume target = 6-8 (mL/kg)*IBW
